sentences.sentence: They might also be brought to the cemetery for prayers and blessings.
sentences.translation: 他们也可能被带到墓地去祈祷并祝福。

sentences.sentence: "What blessings this child has brought from Frankfurt," Brigida said.
sentences.translation: 布丽吉特说：“这个孩子从法兰克福带来了多少的祝福啊。”

sentences.sentence: I feel that I must praise and thank the Lord for the blessings He has brought to us all!
sentences.translation: 我觉得我必须赞美和感谢上帝，感谢他给我们带来的祝福！
